org.nd4j.linalg.factory

Class Broadcast

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.factory.Broadcast

  • public class Broadcast
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience methods for broadcasts

      • validateBroadcastDims

        public static void validateBroadcastDims(INDArray x,
                                         INDArray y,
                                         INDArray z,
                                         int... dimensions)
        Validate the broadcast dimensions for manual broadcast ops such as BroadcastMulOp. Here, the dimensions are those that the arrays match on WRT X. For example, mul([a,b,c], [a,c], 0,2)
